title: Warren Buffett’s Overlooked Edge
description: What makes Warren Buffett special doesn’t show up in a stat sheet, explains Bloomberg Opinion columnist Nir Kaissar. Here’s what Wall Street can learn from the Oracle of Omaha. (Source: Bloomberg)
content: What makes Warren Buffett special doesn’t show up in a stat sheet, explains Bloomberg Opinion columnist Nir Kaissar. Here’s what Wall Street can learn from the Oracle of Omaha. (Source: Bloomberg)
